name: Online Succes
author: Online Succes

sections.description:
With Online Succes you convert anonymous website visitors into new sales opportunities, recognize people based on a form submission, follow them up automatically and increase the ROI of your online marketing activities.

You need a free Online Succes account so you can view the companies and contacts that visit your website.
Create Account

Our plugin sends all pageviews of your website to our servers so we can recognize the companies and contacts visiting your website.
Terms of use
Privacy Statement
sections.installation:
1. Go to the Plugins Menu in WordPress
  2. Search for “Online Succes”
  3. Click “Install”
  4. Activate the plugin
  5. Go to the plugin settings in the left menu in WordPress Admin -> Settings -> Online Succes
  6. Add your Account ID and Tracking ID. You can find them in your Online Succes company profile.
  7. Click the button ‘Save Settings’
sections.faq:
Do I need an Online Succes account to use this plugin?
Yes, get a free account here.

1.0

  • Initial release
